verses.roman:
pūrvavat kaila prabhu lañā bhakta-gaṇa
parama ānande karena nartana-kīrtana

synonyms: pūrva-vat—as previously; kaila—did; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lañā—taking; bhakta-gaṇa—all the devotees; parama ānande—in great pleasure; karena—performs; nartana-kīrtana—chanting and dancing.
translation: As previously, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and His devotees again chanted and danced with great pleasure.
